message: I propose we split the money 75/25, with you receiving $25. I believe this is fair given the potential risk of inflation.
I think we can do better than 25. I'm offering a 60/40 split, with me getting the majority. It's still a fair deal, considering the risk of inflation is still uncertain.
Considering the uncertainty of inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures both of us receive an equal share without any risk of loss.

I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share. I'm offering a 45/55 split, with me getting a smaller majority. This way, we can both get a decent share of the money, considering the inflation is eating away at our gains.
